mapper.select: SELECT go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE, go_treat.GO_HOSPITAL_ID, go_hospital.GO_HOSPITAL_NAME, go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_ID, go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NAME, go_treat.GO_DOCTOR_ID, go_doctor.GO_DOCTOR_NAME, go_treat.GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE, go_treat_subject.GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_NAME, go_treat.GO_CHART_CODE, go_treat.GO_CHART_SEQ, go_treat.GO_TREAT_CONTENTS, go_treat.GO_TREAT_REGISTRATION_DATE FROM go_treat JOIN go_hospital ON go_treat.GO_HOSPITAL_ID=go_hospital.GO_HOSPITAL_ID JOIN go_citizen on go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_ID=go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_ID JOIN go_doctor on go_treat.GO_DOCTOR_ID=go_doctor.GO_DOCTOR_ID JOIN go_treat_subject on go_treat.GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE=go_treat_subject.GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE WHERE go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE = #{treatCode}
